programme.desc: The inexperienced members of a high school robotics club take on the burdensome task of challenging the team of the prestigious MIT, who are the reigning robotics champions. Despite the various obstacles in their way, those four high school students prove that where there's a will, there's a way.(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Style
programme.desc: Weighed down by his father's perpetual disapproval, Kung Fu kid Dodo Lee finds solace in his aspiration to join Oscar Lei's studio. But reality has a way of frustrating dreams, as Dodo discovers that behind Oscar's veneer lies a power-hungry man that Dodo must fight with the help of star Kitty Mo.(n)

programme.title: Bling
programme.desc: Sam dreams of winning the heart of his dream girl Sue, and believes that getting an expensive ring will be the key to her heart. But as he discovers Oscar's evil plan, Sam decides to team up with his robot superheroes friends in an attempt to save the city from Oscar's scheme.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Vampire Vlad arrives at Hotel Transylvania for a surprise family get-together, and a collision between supernatural old-school and modern day coolness ensues.(n)

programme.title: Saving Christmas
programme.desc: With his brother-in-law threatening to bring down the spirits during a Christmas bash, Kirk sets out to bring his cynical brother-in-law into the light and prove that the true spirit of Christmas lies with Jesus Christ instead of the commercialized celebrations.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Kai and Gerda are now grown up and entering a new stage, but this time they are causing a global catastrophe.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula runs a high-end resort for monsters far away from the human world. The Count's monster-haven bubble is burst when a boy named Jonathan stumbles upon his resort and falls in love with his daughter.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Star
programme.desc: (Noel) believes she has the gift to perform miracles,as she was born in Christmas. When her life is threatened by a deceptive developer called (McKerrod), (Noel) has to work with her friends to stop him and save the city.(n)

programme.title: The Snow Queen 2: The Snow King
programme.desc: The Snow Queen casts a curse on her mirror, making it reveal the worse in every one who looks at it.(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: Fredrick and Eleanor Little go to an orphanage to adopt a child to be a brother for their son, George. There, they find a small white mouse called Stuart, and they decide to adopt him. Stuart has to deal with Snowbell, the family cat that wants to get rid of him.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A mother is forced to move with her son, from the United States to live in China. He's embraced by a Kung Fu master who teaches him all the secrets of the game and changes his life, and the life of his mother for the better.(n)

programme.title: Ratchet and Clank
programme.desc: Ratchet and Clank are on a mission to protect the Galaxy of Solana from getting destructed by Sherman Drake when they find a weapon that can destroy all planets. They join forces with the Galaxy Rangers to save the entire galaxy from imminent danger.(n)

programme.title: Spare Parts
programme.desc: The inexperienced members of a high school robotics club take on the burdensome task of challenging the team of the prestigious MIT, who are the reigning robotics champions. Despite the various obstacles in their way, those four high school students prove that where there's a will, there's a way.(n)

programme.title: Growing Up Smith
programme.desc: When his family moves to the US, a young Indian boy is eager to embrace the American dream that he is drawn to the family next-door after he develops a crush on their daughter. As he drifts away from his family values, his parents are forced to resort to drastic measures to set him straight.(n)

programme.title: Spark: A Space Tail
programme.desc: General Zhong controls Planet Bana, tearing it to pieces. Spark intervenes to stop his evil plan to dominate the world with the help of the monster Kraken, the beast with the most lethal weapon of all time. Spark travels with his friends to get to the monster before it is too late.(n)

programme.title: Race to Win
programme.desc: In the wake of her father's death, Hannah faces the daunting prospect of having her family's fate hinge on the outcome of a race that she must win.(n)

programme.title: Marshall's Miracle
programme.desc: When a bullied boy comes across an injured dog kept by an animal hoarder after other dogs left him for dead, he pulls off a daring rescue to save the dog that he comes to bond with.(n)

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: The new evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, the man who took over the company from Tarazan's parents, dispatches a mercenary army that Tarazan and Jane Porter will have to face, for themselves and for the jungle.(n)

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A failed scientist's luck turns around when he invents a machine that can get food to fall from the sky, but things take a disastrous turn and he has to reverse his invention to save his town.(n)

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: When a toy company employs military technology in its newest action figures line, they inadvertently start an action figure war when two lines of action figures start thinking for themselves- and take the rivalry between the two lines to new heights.(n)

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: With his eyes on the throne, a vengeful sorcerer turns Princess Odette into a swan in the hopes of seizing her father's kingdom. It's only through true love that the curse can be lifted, but Odette's intended, Prince Derek, must find her first before he gets to prove how much he loves her.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Vampire Vlad arrives at Hotel Transylvania for a surprise family get-together, and a collision between supernatural old-school and modern day coolness ensues.(n)

programme.title: Belong to Us
programme.desc: A loving family opens their home and hearts to an injured dog after the dog manages to make it out of a brutal dog-fighting ring.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Jurassic Pet: Chapter 1
programme.desc: As a young boy decides to help a friendly dinosaur escape from the clutches of a crazy scientist who wants to use him for experiments, he embarks with him on an adventure he never imagined.(n)

programme.title: Coconut the Little Dragon 2: Into the Jungle
programme.desc: Coconut the Little Dragon gets excited for spending the holiday with his friends Oskar and Matilda at a summer camp. But soon the vacation becomes a nightmare when the wild Water Dragons and carnivorous plants come along.(n)

programme.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: When detective Harry Goodman, goes missing, his 21 year-old son, Tim, joins Harry's former Pokémon partner, the hilarious and adorable Detective Pikachu to find out what happened. Using their unique ability to communicate, they chase clues and uncover a shocking plot that may destroy their world.(n)

programme.title: Wonderstruck
programme.desc: In a parallel telling, the film tells the story of two children who belong to different times but share one the search for an estranged parental figure that each is willing to do anything to find.(n)

programme.title: Up and Away
programme.desc: Hodja is a boy from Pjort who borrows a flying carpet to see the world, in exchange for finding and returning "diamond" to her grandfather, but the greedy Sultan wants to have the carpet to himself.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella and the Secret Prince
programme.desc: During the Royal Ball, Cinderella and her mice friends discover a secret that could shake their the real prince has turned into a mouse by the evil witch, and the "Prince" from the Royal Ball is a fraud. Cinderella and her friends begin a whole new adventure to save the real Prince, and help him defeat the evil force.(n)

programme.title: Fantastica: A Boonie Bears Adventure
programme.desc: In the land of Fantastica, the Boonie Bears and Bald Qiang team up with a fearless female warrior to put an end to the plot of super-powered thieves who want to steal an artifact and destroy an ancient forest.(n)

programme.title: The Last Prince of Atlantis
programme.desc: The tyrannical Don Vincenzo forces a simple pearl-fisher to sell him his boat before he demands the man's daughter, Adrianna, as well. Despite her refusal, Adrianna has no recompense against Don Vincenzo's wealth and power, until a mysterious prince emerges from the sea and falls for her.(n)

programme.title: To The Beat!
programme.desc: The twins Mia and Mackie love to dance since they were very little. When they learn about an online dance contest, they form a team to compete for a chance to be in a video with their favorite pop star.(n)

programme.title: You Can Tutu
programme.desc: As she and her father move to a new neighborhood, Tutu pursues her dream of dancing in the lead, as she tries to bring her talent and her passion for ballet into play.(n)

programme.title: Remi, Nobody's Boy
programme.desc: The adventures of the young orphan, Rémi, who was adopted but is later taken away from his adoptive mother as he embarks on a journey with an itinerant musician. As they travel across France, Rémi learns a lot about life, love, and companionship.(n)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent (Angelina Jolie) lived peacefully in her kingdom , but one day a group of invaders threatened the kingdom. When Maleficent tried to protect her home, she was betrayed. Driven by revenge, Maleficent casts her curse on the invading king and his new born Princess Arora (Elle Fanning).(n)

programme.title: Artemis Fowl
programme.desc: As the descendant of a long family of master criminals, Artemis Fowl II finds himself on the hunt for his missing father, becoming entangled with dwarves and fairies as he seeks to locate the gang of fairies that kidnapped his father.(n)

programme.title: The Lego Star Wars Holiday Special
programme.desc: Seeking to gain further information about the Force, Rey embarks on a trip in preparation for Life Day, only to be thrust into an adventure taking place across different timelines.(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: The movie is about a teenage girl who feels like her mother doesn't give her enough attention, and in return, her mother feels that she is careless. When they get into a heated argument at a Chinese restaurant, a woman comes in and gives them a fortune cookie that will get them to switch their lives. How will each of them see the other one's life.(n)

programme.title: Coco
programme.desc: Miguel is a young ambitious boy who wishes to be a musician despite his family’s prohibition of it. When one day he decides to visit his idol Ernesto de la Cruz and goes to The Land of the Dead, where he finds out about the history of the family by speaking to the dead family members.(n)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: Princess Giselle, who hails from an animated fairy tale kingdom, is banished to the real world by an evil queen. Adrift in an unrecognizable world, she brings magic and wide-eyed optimism to modern-day Manhatten as she starts to fall for a charming lawyer and his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Magic Camp
programme.desc: A frustrated former magician is offered a chance to return to the magic camp that witnessed his beginning, this time as an instructor for the new generation of magic hopefuls. As he tries to help the kids achieve their potential, he ends up getting a new lease on life himself.(n)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Princess Elsa (Idina Menzel) has power to create ice, but she suppressed it because of an accident that nearly killed her sister Anna (Kristen Bell). During Elsa's inauguration as a queen, things get out of hand and Elsa escapes. Anna decides to accompany Kristoff and Olaf on a journey to find Elsa and save the kingdom.(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat named (Remy) dreams of being a chef, and after he's separated from his family,he arrives in Paris and then settles in the kitchen of a fancy restaurant. When a young man(Linguini) joins the restaurant, Remy helps him become a skillful cook, which makes the other chefs jealous.(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to Wonderland through a mirror, and goes on a quest to save the Mad Hatter’s life, by rescuing his family from their doomed fate – she steals the Chronosphere form Time, to travel back in time, but that would lead Wonderland to parish.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lola travels with her family from New York to New Jersey. In her new school, Lola befriends the shy girl (Ella), where she loves the rock band. Lula enters a competition with Carla, the most popular girl, for the school play tournament. Their favorite team announces their retirement from music. Lula has to do the impossible in order to attend the concert, and see her dream singer (Stu).(n)

Lula has to do the impossible in order to attend the concert, and see her dream singer (Stu).(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to Wonderland through a mirror, and goes on a quest to save the Mad Hatter’s life, by rescuing his family from their doomed fate – she steals the Chronosphere form Time, to travel back in time, but that would lead Wonderland to parish.(n)

programme.title: Canal Football Club
programme.desc: Retour à son format historique pour le CFC! Hervé Mathoux accompagné de Pierre Ménès, Laure Boulleau, Dominique Armand et Gauthier Kuntzmann prennent l’antenne à 19h25 pour un tour complet de l’actu du foot hexagonal et mondial. Tous les buts, toutes les images et les analyses des consultants experts de CANAL+ en plateau, sans oublier les grands reportages et interviews exclusives, avant de plonger dans l’avant match de l’affiche de Ligue 1 Uber Eats du dimanche soir sur CANAL+.(n)

programme.title: Canal Football Club Le débrief
programme.desc: L’équipe du CFC débriefe à chaud le match du dimanche soir. Entre débats et analyses avec les consultants en plateau ou au stade, les réactions des acteurs du match sur le vif et la note du match. Les abonnés retrouvent également leurs rubriques attendues : L’intégrale, Version Originale, Tour d’Europe Express, le Top Buts et le Stop 10.(n)
